/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the warm glow of a setting sun. The sky, painted in hues of orange, serves as a dramatic backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun, partially obscured by the city's towering structures, casts long shadows and infuses the scene with a golden light.

On either side of the street, tall buildings stretch towards the sky, their facades adorned with a variety of advertisements and billboards. The street itself is a hive of activity with several cars and buses navigating their way. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human element to the urban panorama.

The image is taken from a low angle, which accentuates the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action. The perspective also allows for a comprehensive view of the street, the buildings, and the people, providing a snapshot of city life at sunset.
